statements: SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT policyholder_id, name FROM policyholders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT policyholder_id, address FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE address IS NOT NULL LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT name, address, contact_details FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE name = 'John Smith' OR name = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders ORDER BY address DESC, policyholder_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM policies;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policyholder_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT name, address, contact_details FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, name FROM policies JOIN policyholders ON policies.policyholder_id = policyholders.id;
SELECT policy_type, COUNT(*) FROM policies GROUP BY policy_type;
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM Policyholders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date FROM Policies WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.policy_id, p.policy_type, b.name AS beneficiary_name FROM Policies p LEFT JOIN Beneficiaries b ON p.policy_id = b.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM Policyholders WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE start_date > '2020-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.policy_id, p.start_date, b.name AS beneficiary_name FROM Policies p INNER JOIN Beneficiaries b ON p.policy_id = b.policy_id;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_type, COUNT(*) AS policy_count FROM Policies GROUP BY policy_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM policyholders LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE id = 3;
SELECT plan_name, coverage_amount FROM policy_plans WHERE premium > 500;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM policy_claim ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM policy_transactions WHERE policy_id = 6;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM policyholders WHERE id = 2;
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM policy_claim WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT plan_name, coverage_amount, premium FROM policy_plans ORDER BY premium DESC;
SELECT policy_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM policy_transactions GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_transactions > 10000;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM policies ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT name, relationship FROM beneficiaries WHERE policy_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM policyholders JOIN policies ON policyholders.policyholder_id = policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT name, relationship FROM beneficiaries WHERE policy_id = 1001 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT policyholders.name, payments.amount, payments.payment_date FROM policyholders JOIN payments ON policyholders.policyholder_id = payments.policy_id WHERE payments.amount > 500;

SELECT policyholders.name, claims.claim_date, claims.description FROM policyholders JOIN claims ON policyholders.policyholder_id = claims.policy_id WHERE claims.claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
